channel.title: Hotkeys! Help
channel.description:
Ok guys, I want to know how to add hot keys to the tabs(example: when you press F1 it opens the combat tab, F2 Inventory, etc.) I would GREATLY appreciate any and all help.
-Thanks Zukyak

item.title: Hotkeys! Help
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

My server doesnt have it but I’ve been on several other severs that have it. Rushers use it all the time.

EDIT: I have one hotkey, buts it to toggle the camera motion. heres the code

if(i == KeyEvent.VK_F12){ if(client.cameratoggle == 0){ System.out.println("Camera Movement On"); client.cameratoggle = 1; }else if(client.cameratoggle == 1){ System.out.println("Camera Movement Off"); client.cameratoggle = 0; } }

I just want to make keys able to change tabs… thats all

Read full topic
